snippet: Steven Jackson wasn't waiting by the phone late last month when the Patriots called looking for a running back to plug the holes of their battered backfield....
lead_paragraph: Steven Jackson wasn't waiting by the phone late last month when the Patriots called looking for a running back to plug the holes of their battered backfield.

headline.main: Patriots RB Jackson Chasing Unlikely Super Bowl Appearance
headline.print_headline: Patriots RB Jackson Chasing Unlikely Super Bowl Appearance
